javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.AdjustmentListener, Destructable, DragAndDropTarget, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants, java.io.Serializable, Viewer
Direct Known Subclasses:
BusinessObjectIndentedViewer, FlatViewer, FlowViewer, IndentedViewer, StarViewer
public class IconViewer
extends AbstractViewer
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, DragAndDropTarget

A class representing a scrolling Viewer
